mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.video_id as videoId, c.parent_id as parentId, c.content, c.create_time as createTime, u.id as "user.id", u.nick as "user.nick", u.avatar as "user.avatar" FROM t_video_comment c LEFT JOIN t_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.video_id = #{videoId} AND c.is_delete = 0 AND c.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.video_id as videoId, c.parent_id as parentId, c.content, c.create_time as createTime, u.id as "user.id", u.nick as "user.nick", u.avatar as "user.avatar" FROM t_video_comment c LEFT JOIN t_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.parent_id = #{parentId} AND c.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY c.create_time ASC
select nick from t_user where id = #{replyToUserId}
select user_id from t_video where id = #{videoId}
select title from t_video where id = #{videoPublishUserId}
select account_type from t_user where id = #{userId}
